reference_template: Author, A. A. (Year, Month Day). *Title of webpage*. Site Name. https://www.example.com/page
template_explanation: Webpages include individual author, publication date, page title in italics, site name, and direct URL. For group authors, use the organization name.
common_rules: Individual author or organization as author
Include specific publication date if available
Page title italicized and in sentence case
